page.title: 14ARTS AND CRAFTS IN CLATFORD
page.content: This rural area is home to several {ARTISTIC}people and the {CRAFTS} florish here.Lots of people do sewing and patchwork in the Clatfords.There is a club in the village called the 'Sprat and winkle' club they do patchwork and quilting and{EMBROIDERY. They learn new techniques and enjoy occasional meetings in the evennings. There is an art club run by Mrs.Russell in the Goodworth Clatford village it is very popular.They draw flowers and pictures from slides from various places.They use water colours and oils for their paintings.{POTTERY} is one of the oldest because people made cooking pots.In the Clatfords Mr Fred Williams does woodwork.He uses used matchsticks to make models of gipsy vehicles.
